definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Is price of beautiful Lida mountain bike warrior a number?
sentences.chinese: 美利達山地車勇士的價格是多少？

sentences.english: More and more mountain bikers are moonriding — speeding down trails.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多騎山地車的人喜歡騎車沿小道飛速而下。

sentences.english: That mountain Bike was refitted to become a moped.
sentences.chinese: 那輛山地車已經被改裝成了一輛助力車。

sentences.english: Many innovations are coming from MTB, Road, and other forms of cycling.
sentences.chinese: 許多創新都來自山地車，公路，以及其他形式的單車。

sentences.english: I really treasured my early morning rides to work.
sentences.chinese: 我很珍惜我在清晨踩着山地車去工作的感覺。

sentences.english: XTR. Three letters representing the pinnacle of mountain bike technology.
sentences.chinese: XTR這三個字母代表着山地車科技的頂峯。

sentences.english: If you’ve got an old mountain bike, which I do, that’s good enough.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一輛舊的山地車，像我一樣，就足夠好了。

sentences.english: We professionally produce mountain bicycle saddles and supply them with good quality and competitive price.
sentences.chinese: 我司專業生產山地車鞍座，質量好價格優，歡迎選購。

sentences.english: I ride a mountain bike, usually to and from work.
sentences.chinese: 我經常騎山地車上下班。

sentences.english: I also have a couple of worn toothbrushes I’ve kept to clean the chain of my mountain-bike.
sentences.chinese: 我還保留着一些用舊的牙刷來清潔我的山地車鏈。

sentences.english: If you want what the professionals ride you will have to pay a lot of money a professional MTB.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想坐什麼專業你必須付出很多的錢專業山地車。

sentences.english: I've got to have a light bike.
sentences.chinese: 我必須有一輛輕便的山地車。

sentences.english: I bought a mountain bike and was ready for a triathlon, I thought.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一輛山地車，想準備參加一項三項賽。

sentences.english: Back wheel beautiful benefit amounts to 08 challenger mountain bike, does tower machine flee to move?
sentences.chinese: 美利達08款挑戰者山地車後輪塔機竄動？

definition: racing bicycle (abbr. for 公路自行車|公路自行车[gong1 lu4 zi4 xing2 che1])
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)

(martial arts) wind-and-fire wheel, weapon used in hand-to-hand fighting/(Daoism) a magical pair of wheels on which one can stand to ride at great speed, used by Nezha 哪吒[Ne2 zha5]/(fig.) never-ending treadmill
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3
